actions.text: On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment earmarks $1 million of the funds appropriated for section 515 rental housing to be used to fund a loan guarantee program for multifamily rental housing in rural areas, provided the program is duly authorized.
purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 31 in the Congressional Record of July 17, 1995, to earmark $1 million of the $82 million in funds appropriated for Section 515 rental housing to be used to fund a loan guarantee program for multifamily rental housing in rural areas, provided the program is duly authorized.
